actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS
  SET   CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_TYPE= {{appsmith.store.vayIndAddrType}},
        CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE1= {{appsmith.store.vayNcComAddr1}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE2= {{appsmith.store.vayNcComAddr2}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_CITY= {{appsmith.store.vayNcComCity}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_DISTRICT= {{appsmith.store.vayNcComDistrict}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_ZIP= {{appsmith.store.vayNcComPinCode}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_STATE= {{appsmith.store.vayNcComState}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_COUNTRY= {{appsmith.store.vayNewAddCountryCode}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_NO =  {{Input1Copy.text}},
 	CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_EXTEN = {{Input2Copy.text}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE1= {{appsmith.store.vayNcRegAddr1}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_LINE2= {{appsmith.store.vayNcRegAddr2}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_CITY= {{appsmith.store.vayNcRegCity}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_DISTRICT= {{appsmith.store.vayNcRegDistrict}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_ZIP= {{appsmith.store.vayNcRegPinCode}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_STATE= {{appsmith.store.vayNcRegState}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_ADDRESS_COUNTRY= {{appsmith.store.vayNewAddCountryCode}},
	CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_NO =  {{vayRegContactNo.text}},
 	CUSTOMER_COMM_PHONE_EXTEN = {{Input2.text}}	
WHERE OID = {{appsmith.store.customerEntityOIDForAddress}}
AND CUSTOMER_OID = {{ appsmith.store.customerOID }}
AND CUSTOMER_REG_ADDRESS_TYPE = {{appsmith.store.vayIndAddrType}}
